data.title: California Cities by Population (2024)
data.meta_description: Get a list of California cities by population based on Census 2023 data.
data.text:
The most populated cities in California are Los Angeles with 3,820,914, San Diego at 1,388,320, San Jose with 969,655, San Francisco at 808,988, and Fresno with 545,716. You can get the most current Census population data for all 1,573 California cities, sorted from the most populous cities in California to the least, according to the 2023 Population Estimates Program and 2022 American Community Survey.

Sure, you can copy this list right into your favorite spreadsheet tool. Or save yourself formatting headaches and grab the latest California cities population data as a ready-to-use Excelâ„¢ file below. It's time to stop searching and start digging into data!
